Title: The Watch
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Toni Graphia (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Laura Donnelly, Douglas Henshall
Plot: A Redcoat deserter from Jamie's past returns; Jenny goes into labor; Jamie and Ian join the Watch.
